sentences.english: Practice makes clear, sufficient bath can yet be regarded as a kind of reliable local soak therapeutics.
sentences.chinese: 实践表明，足浴不失为一种可靠的局部浸润疗法。

sentences.english: To discuss the efficacy of TCM and Qi-blood Circulation Machine in treating heel pain.
sentences.chinese: 探讨中药足浴配合气血循环机在治疗跟痛症中的效果。

sentences.english: Women do a foot soak called zu yu before bed.
sentences.chinese: 女人们在睡前泡脚，这叫做足浴。

sentences.english: Before starting your treatment I will give you're a Floral Foot Bath.
sentences.chinese: 在开始水疗之前，我会给您先来个植物香足浴。

sentences.english: Get free essential oil foot bath, while choosing any item of our SPA.
sentences.chinese: 选择SPA所有的项目都可以免费精油足浴。

sentences.english: Foot can be used as therapy in patients outside the rule, three kinds of role can influence each other.
sentences.chinese: 足浴可作为内病外治的疗法，三种作用可以互相影响。

definition: to bathe/to immerse oneself in a warm bath
to soak in a spa or hot spring
Arishang Nahiyisi or Wenquan county in Börtala Mongol autonomous prefecture 博爾塔拉蒙古自治州|博尔塔拉蒙古自治州, Xinjiang
cupping glass/fire cupping (acupressure technique of Chinese medicine, with fired vacuum cup applied to the skin)/ventouse (vacuum method used in obstetrics)
suction cup (used in Chinese medicine to draw the blood and qi 氣|气)/detachable suction chimney to make a stove draw
